[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Validation: Author] [Zero Address] Can author field be set to AccountAddress::ZERO or another invalid address, and would this pass validation in verify()? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Validation: LedgerInfo] [Empty LedgerInfo] Can CommitVote be created with LedgerInfo::dummy() or empty BlockInfo, and would this cause issues in consensus? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Validation: Signature] [Empty Signature] Can CommitVote contain an empty or zero signature, and would this be caught during construction or only during verification? (High)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Validation: Round] [Invalid Round] Can round number be u64::MAX or other extreme values that cause overflow in consensus logic? (Medium)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Validation: Epoch] [Invalid Epoch] Can epoch be set to 0 or u64::MAX causing issues with epoch state lookups? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Consistency: CommitInfo] [BlockInfo Divergence] Can commit_info().round() return different value than round(), causing state inconsistency in consensus? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Consistency: LedgerInfo] [Epoch Mismatch] Can ledger_info().epoch() differ from epoch(), and would this be detected before vote aggregation? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Consistency: Signature] [Signature-Data Mismatch] Can the signature be valid BLS but signed over different LedgerInfo than contained in CommitVote? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Error: Construction] [Construction Failure] If new() returns CryptoMaterialError, does the caller properly handle this or could partial CommitVotes be created? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Error: Verification] [Verification Error Handling] When verify() fails with anyhow::Result, does the caller distinguish between invalid signature vs author mismatch vs network error? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Error: Panic] [Unwrap Safety] Does any code path in CommitVote implementation use .unwrap() or .expect() that could panic on malicious input? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Type: Author] [Author Type Safety] Is Author (AccountAddress) properly validated to be a valid validator address before use in CommitVote? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Type: Round] [Round Type Safety] Is Round type (u64) used consistently throughout, or could type confusion between Round and other u64 values occur? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Memory: Lifetime] [Reference Lifetimes] Do all reference-returning functions (ledger_info(), commit_info(), signature()) properly constrain lifetimes to prevent use-after-free? (High)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Memory: Arc] [Arc Cycles] Could SignatureWithStatus's Arc<AtomicBool> create reference cycles causing memory leaks? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Memory: Size] [Structure Size] Is CommitVote size reasonable, or could large LedgerInfo or BlockInfo cause excessive memory usage when caching votes? (Low)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Network: Encoding] [Message Encoding] Can malformed network-encoded CommitVote messages cause deserialization panics or infinite loops? (High)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Network: Size] [Message Size Limit] Is there a maximum size for CommitVote messages to prevent bandwidth exhaustion attacks? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Network: Validation] [Pre-Verification] Are CommitVotes validated before being added to network buffers, or could invalid votes consume memory? (Medium)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Safety: Agreement] [Vote Agreement] Can two validators create conflicting CommitVotes for same round/epoch with valid signatures, violating agreement property? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Safety: Validity] [Vote Validity] Does CommitVote ensure that only executed blocks can be voted on, or could votes for non-executed blocks be created? (Critical)
[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [Safety: Termination] [Vote Termination] Can CommitVote processing enter infinite loops or hang indefinitely during verification? (High)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [QC: Threshold] [Quorum Threshold] When aggregating CommitVotes into commit proof, is 2f+1 voting power threshold properly enforced? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [QC: Validator Set] [Validator Set Staleness] Can CommitVotes be aggregated using stale validator sets, allowing revoked validators to participate in quorum? (Critical)

[File: consensus/consensus-types/src/pipeline/commit_vote.rs] [QC: Duplicate Votes] [Vote Deduplication] When same validator submits multiple CommitVotes for same round, are duplicates properly rejected or could voting power be double-counted? (Critical)
